iata:handlingSpecialHandlingDescription.description: Describes the special handling text indicating that nature of consignment may necessitate use of special handling procedures

iata:handlingSpecialHandlingCode.description: Identifies the special handling code indicating that nature of consignment may necessitate use of special handling procedures

iata:handlingSpecialServiceRequestDescri.description: Describes in free text the instructions for special action required

iata:handlingSpecialServiceRequestCode.description: Identifies the code related to instructions for special action required

iata:handlingOtherServiceInfoDesciption.description: Describes in free text used to specify a remarks relating to a shipment

iata:handlingOtherServiceInfoCode.description: Identifies the code related to other service information
